question: How does the person fix the branch piece into the stem of the branch with the knife?
options: The person grips the knife in his left hand, carefully slices a notch into the stem, and gently places the branch piece into the notch.
The person holds the knife firmly with both hands and smoothly guides it through the stem, then attempts to set the branch piece on top for gentle insertion.
The person holds the knife in his right hand, carefully cuts a notch into the stem, to insert the branch piece into the notch, securing it with a gentle push.
The person uses the knife held in his right hand to make a precise cut into the stem, creating an opening, and then gently inserts the branch piece with precision.
The person places the knife down and tries to gently push the branch piece into the stem without the knife, securing it with his hand.
